video.title: Lab Rats
video.synopsis: When high schooler Leo moves into his stepfather's home, he's surprised to learn he has three stepsiblings -- each with bionic powers.

episodes.synopsis: Leo discovers three teens with bionic abilities living in the cellar of his new home.
episodes.title: Crush, Chop & Burn: Pt. 1

episodes.synopsis: Leo's life greatly improves when he takes his bionic, superhuman siblings to school.
episodes.title: Crush, Chop & Burn: Pt. 2

episodes.synopsis: On the Lab Rats' first day of school, Leo hopes his siblings will help him get a better seat at lunch.
episodes.title: Commando App

episodes.synopsis: When Adam tries to help Leo ask his crush to a dance, she takes a shine to Adam instead.
episodes.title: Leo's Jam

episodes.synopsis: The Lab Rats are tasked with their first mission when Davenport's high-tech locomotive becomes a runaway train.
episodes.title: Rats on a Train

episodes.synopsis: In an attempt to prove he's a model student, Chase installs machines to improve the school.
episodes.title: Smart and Smarter

episodes.synopsis: Leo tries to help Davenport set up for his annual conference but instead ruins a prized invention.
episodes.title: Exoskeleton vs. Grandma

episodes.synopsis: Adam, Bree, and Chase forget to invite Leo to his birthday party.
episodes.title: Bionic Birthday Fail

episodes.synopsis: When Adam refuses to cheat by using his bionic abilities to win a contest, Leo tricks him into activating them.
episodes.title: Death Spiral Smackdown

episodes.synopsis: When Leo's crush comes over, he borrows Davenport's high-speed helicopter to impress her.
episodes.title: Can I Borrow the Helicopter?

episodes.synopsis: Davenport's time machine brings a future Leo to the present to prevent the kids from embarking on a deadly mission.
episodes.title: Back from the Future

episodes.synopsis: Growing bored with their abilities, the Lab Rats swap bionic chips for the day.
episodes.title: Chip Switch

episodes.synopsis: With Leo's parents on vacation, things go awry when he plays with a new gadget that creates problems for the Lab Rats.
episodes.title: Drone Alone

episodes.synopsis: When Adam, Bree and Chase learn about chores and earning an allowance, they soon become obsessed with making money.
episodes.title: Chore Wars

episodes.synopsis: Tasha takes the kids on a beach outing, but there's a catch: They're forbidden to use technology.
episodes.title: Dude, Where's My Lab?

episodes.synopsis: To combat Trent's bullying, Leo signs up for a one-on-one basketball game against his rival.
episodes.title: Air Leo

episodes.synopsis: While working in Davenport's lab, Leo accidentally unleashes an evil Internet virus.
episodes.title: Night of the Living Virus

episodes.synopsis: When the kids are caught using bionics on camera, they must recover the evidence before anybody sees it.
episodes.title: Mission Invisible

episodes.synopsis: The Lab Rats befriend a new kid at school, but Leo quickly realizes that there's something strange about him.
episodes.title: Concert in a Can

episodes.synopsis: Chase accidentally discovers that he has a hidden ability: telekinesis.
episodes.title: Mission: Space

episodes.synopsis: When the Lab Rats take Davenport's self-driving car for a spin, Leo becomes trapped inside!
episodes.title: Speed Trapped

episodes.synopsis: After failing to study for a test, Leo tries to cheat off Bree using Davenport's "Fly Spy" device.
episodes.title: Spy Fly

episodes.synopsis: Feeling like the least "exciting" person in the house, Leo takes on a challenge to prove his worth.
episodes.title: Missin' The Mission

episodes.synopsis: When the Rats return from a mission, Davenport discovers that Bree was exposed to a toxic chemical.
episodes.title: Quarantined

episodes.synopsis: Chase and Leo enter a robot battling competition where they hope to defeat the returning champion.
episodes.title: Robot Fight Club

episodes.synopsis: Chase outsmarts Adam with a prank that hurts not only his aura of invincibility but his confidence.
episodes.title: Bro Down

episodes.synopsis: The Lab Rats confide in Leo their frustrations about not being able to do normal teenage things.
episodes.title: The Rats Strike Back

episodes.synopsis: Leo is inadvertently sucked into Davenport's new invention, which transports him to a parallel universe.
episodes.title: Parallel Universe

episodes.synopsis: Convinced that his new "magic" skill will boost his rep, Leo signs himself up for a talent show.
episodes.title: Spike's Got Talent

episodes.synopsis: Leo follows Marcus to a secret lair where he overhears Marcus talk to an unseen mastermind.
episodes.title: Leo vs. Evil

episodes.synopsis: The Lab Rats inadvertently ruin Davenport's new $15 million painting!
episodes.title: Hole in One

episodes.synopsis: When Adam gets his driver's license, Davenport sets out to buy him a new, safe vehicle.
episodes.title: Trucked Out

episodes.synopsis: Davenport and his new obnoxious neighbor agree to settle their differences with a stock car race.
episodes.title: The Bionic 500

episodes.synopsis: With Douglas now revealed as Marcus' master, the two infiltrate Davenport's lab and kidnap him.
episodes.title: Bionic Showdown: Pt. 1

episodes.synopsis: Now alone, except for Eddy, Leo must figure out how to rescue Davenport and the Lab Rats.
episodes.title: Bionic Showdown: Pt. 2

episodes.synopsis: Leo uses a memory erase device on Davenport and accidently erases 25 years rendering him a teenager.
episodes.title: Memory Wipe

episodes.synopsis: Chase heads to the arctic to retrieve rare minerals but soon finds himself trapped in an avalanche.
episodes.title: Avalanche!

episodes.synopsis: To get out of training duties, Adam and Leo use Davenport's cloning device to create another Adam.
episodes.title: Adam Up

episodes.synopsis: The big game is approaching and Chase is assigned to guard the school mascots dingo costume.
episodes.title: Llama Drama

episodes.synopsis: Trent the bully is tormenting Leo again and he has had enough!
episodes.title: The Haunting of Mission Creek High

episodes.synopsis: Perry gets Davenport to create a robotic version of herself that will help patrol the students.
episodes.title: Perry 2.0

episodes.synopsis: Chase inadvertently shrinks Adam down to two inches!
episodes.title: My Little Brother

episodes.synopsis: Bree is tired of being the target of the boys pranks and partners with Davenport for payback.
episodes.title: Prank You Very Much

episodes.synopsis: It's Christmas Eve and the Lab Rats have to go on a rescue mission to Davenport's secret facility in the frozen tundra.
episodes.title: Twas the Mission Before Christmas

episodes.synopsis: When Trent demands that Leo and Chase help him study for an important science test, they use the opportunity as payback for his years of bullying.
episodes.title: Trent Gets Schooled

episodes.synopsis: Davenport is under attack by a hacker that has not only left Davenport Industries in ruins but has stolen his entire fortune.
episodes.title: No Going Back

episodes.synopsis: The Lab Rats hide out on a cargo freighter to elude the FBI, but a submarine bearing down on the ship could force them to reveal their location.
episodes.title: Sink or Swim: Pt. 1

episodes.synopsis: After their adventure with the submarine, the Lab Rats return home but fall under the dangerous influence of the Triton app.
episodes.title: Sink or Swim: Pt. 2

episodes.synopsis: To raise money to rebuild the destroyed lab, Davenport attempts a dangerous stunt with his new specialized jet wing.
episodes.title: The Jet-Wing

episodes.synopsis: To appease principal Perry, the Lab Rats take her on a fake mission -- and inadvertently put Mission Creek High in the path of a very real rocket.
episodes.title: Mission: Mission Creek High

episodes.synopsis: Bree takes a new job but soon runs into conflict with Chase at work, and Leo and Adam blow off chores to build a turbocharged zip line.
episodes.title: Zip It

episodes.synopsis: Adam and Chase use a phone to video themselves showing off their bionic powers -- and then lose the phone, risking their exposure to the world.
episodes.title: Not So Smart Phone

episodes.synopsis: Leo invents a pair of attack orbs for protection, but instead they cause havoc when they fail to distinguish the good guys from the bad guys.
episodes.title: Scramble the Orbs

episodes.synopsis: Armed with incredible new bionic powers, Krane takes Tasha and Leo captive in order to force a showdown with Chase, Adam and Bree.
episodes.title: Taken

episodes.synopsis: Forbidden by Davenport to travel abroad and generally fed up with her bionic abilities, Bree destroys her bionic chip and deserts the team.
episodes.title: Three Minus Bree

episodes.synopsis: When Donald tries and fails to rebuild Bree's bionic chip, Leo secretly enlists the chip's original maker, Douglas, for some help.
episodes.title: Which Father Knows Best?

episodes.synopsis: At a sci-fi movie convention, the team tangles over who gets to meet the film's star, and Leo and Davenport compete to land a role in the sequel.
episodes.title: Alien Gladiators

episodes.synopsis: Douglas unlocks new abilities for Chase so that he will not feel overshadowed by Adam, but the new shift in power throws the team off-kilter.
episodes.title: Brother Battle

episodes.synopsis: Chase and Adam use an old cyborg shark for a prank, but the robot's artificial intelligence goes haywire, trapping the gang in the house.
episodes.title: Cyborg Shark Attack

episodes.synopsis: When the Lab Rats are secretly captured on video using their powers, the clip goes viral and exposes their secret. But who filmed them, and why?
episodes.title: You Posted What!?!: Pt. 1

episodes.synopsis: Discovering that Krane was behind the video that blew their cover, the Lab Rats attack -- only to find that Krane has a more sinister secret.
episodes.title: You Posted What!?!: Pt. 2

episodes.synopsis: During a strange lunar eclipse, the team discovers that principal Perry has been replaced by a dangerous alien lookalike.
episodes.title: Principal from Another Planet

episodes.synopsis: Bree plays a prank on Adam right before a big school dance, but the laughs are on her when the joke backfires. Meanwhile, Leo snoops on Davenport.
episodes.title: Face Off

episodes.synopsis: Leo's stunt to impress a girl with his bionic arm backfires, and the team schemes to get agent Graham ousted and Davenport reinstated as their leader.
episodes.title: Armed and Dangerous

episodes.synopsis: Adam jealously sabotages Chase when he takes a girl out on a date, and Leo and Bree suspect principal Perry of foul play.
episodes.title: Spike Fright

episodes.synopsis: The Lab Rats add real bionic powers to their action figures to boost sales of the toys, but the new features prove to be a little too effective.
episodes.title: Merry Glitchmas

episodes.synopsis: With the Lab Rats distracted over petty squabbles about their appearance on a reality TV show, Krane mobilizes his bionic army to take over the world.
episodes.title: Rise of the Secret Soldiers: Pt. 1

episodes.synopsis: To defeat Krane's bionic army and devastating Triton app, the Lab Rats must stop their bickering and find a way to unite their powers.
episodes.title: Rise of the Secret Soldiers: Pt. 2

episodes.synopsis: With Davenport still in critical condition, Leo makes a risky attempt to save his life. Meanwhile, Krane's former bionic soldiers follow Adam home.
episodes.title: Bionic Houseparty

episodes.synopsis: Adam becomes a mentor, but Leo is upset to learn that he must enroll merely as a student at the Bionic Academy. Meanwhile, Chase confronts an enemy.
episodes.title: First Day of Bionic Academy

episodes.synopsis: Davenport leaves Adam, Bree and Chase in charge of the Bionic Academy while he celebrates his anniversary; Leo invites Janelle to the island.
episodes.title: Adam Steps Up

episodes.synopsis: Angry that Leo was picked for a mission instead of him, Spin talks Bob into going on an unauthorized mission to prove their mettle.
episodes.title: Unauthorized Mission
